text: Bitz & Bob is a British-Canadian childrenâ€™s animated television series that aired on CBeebies. == Premise == A problem-solving older sister, Bitz, and her younger brother, Bob, love making things, imaginary adventures and engineering. They explore their love of science, technology, engineering, art and math to invent ways to save the day. ==References== Category:2018 Canadian television series debuts Category:English-language television programs
title: Bitz & Bob
